abstract: Carl C. Icahn and Martin Lipton have stood on opposite sides of conflicts time and again. Now the irascible activist investor is railing against his longtime foe on his blog, and not just in a shareholder meeting.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn and Martin Lipton have stood on opposite sides of conflicts time and again. Now the irascible activist investor is railing against his longtime foe on his blog, and not just in a shareholder meeting.
